name: Fi3
cooked: I’m assuming that you can do it faster. At demand we rebuilt the mempool. Another assumption is that user are authenticated (otherwise there are other ways to DoS the pool), so I can at least detect who is building unusual block. For unknown txs we check if the tx is spendable and do not have conflict with other txs in the proposed block this is enough.
